houses

Class HouseReviews

  • java.lang.Object
    • javafx.application.Application
      • presenter.Window
        • houses.HouseReviews

  • public class HouseReviews
extends Window
    This class creates the reviews page for a specific house advert. Users can view and add reviews for a house and like/dislike other people's reviews.
    Version:
    2.6
    Author:
    Copyright (c) 2015 EyeHouse Ltd. All rights reserved.

      This class handles updating a dislike of a review.

      This class handles updating a like of a review.
      class  HouseReviews.starButtonHandler
      This class handles changing the buttons for the star rating.
